===Etymology===
Originally a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おおやまつみのかみ|大|tr1=ō|t1=great|山|tr2=yama|t2=mountain|つ|tr3=tsu|pos3={{etyl|ojp|-}} possessive particle|神|tr4=mi|t4=god, spirit|の|tr5=no|pos5=possessive particle|神|tr6=kami|t6=god, spirit|pos6=also used as an honorific [[epithet]] for gods}}. The use of {{m|ja|積|tr=tsumi||packing; piling; loading}} to spell the ''tsu mi'' portion is an example of phonetic [[ateji]].
